title: Ep 108: Spitting on TP ft. OKOP Show
description:
Go to BeterHelp.com/Judgies to get 10% Off of your first month of BetterHelp Services!

In This Episode: We have OKOP Show on to discuss a person referencing the Lion King at an inopportune time, a bride mad at her husband for making a mess of the wedding day, a person who had a truly eye opening experience in the shower, and a listener who made a mess on the floor. We also look at some r/the10thdentist posts about cryptocurrencies, spitting on toilet paper, and more!

Follow OKOP Here: 
https://www.youtube.com/c/OKOPShow/

Get Judgies Merch Here:
https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/

Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! 
https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod 

Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
 P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350 

Leave a Review! 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 

Intro Music by: Iván 
https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1 

Time Stamps:
0:00 Intro
3:21 Hair Stories
7:35 TIFU: Lion King
15:30 AITA: Mad at Husband
24:39 TIFU: Eye Opening 
35:12 Break
36:10 CJ: Tenth Dentist
50:51 LS: Mess on the Floor
1:00:26 Outro
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
